name: Spy's Game
description:
Welcome to Spy's Game

It's the middle of 1969, only a few days before the Apollo 11 launch. You just recently been promoted in your work at CIA and 3 new agents have been assigned to you. With the help of these new agents you have to battle with rival KGB agents for Prestige and control of all communities.

These KGB agents will try everything to undermine you and your societies. Make sure you put your agents to good use, every action counts!

Submitted for Historically Accurate Game Jam 3

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Build and Action Tips:

1. The Hunter
- If your agent has high Combat and Counter-Espionage skills, you can send him around to hunt down enemy spies.
- Buy him a "Tapping Device" at start (increases chance to hunt down enemies)
- Then assign "Counter-Espionage" action to him around the communities
- When you get more money, buy him another "Tapping Device" and a gun (improves his Combat skills)

2. The Director
- If your agent has high Speech skill, you can send him in Hollywood to fund movies. Increasing your funds and prestige.
- Assign him to "Fund a Movie" on Hollywood (Costs $500)
- When you get more money, buy him a "Classy Suit" to improve his Speech skill more
- You might want to give him a gun too in case he encounters an enemy agent

3. The Scientist
- If your agent has high Science skill, you can send him in NASA to check for enemy sabotage
- Since the Apollo Mission will give so much prestige when successful, your enemies will try to sabotage the project
- Assign him to "CIA: Inspect" at NASA to ensure Apollo Mission's success
- When you get more money, buy him some "Advanced SmartPhone" to increase his Science skill
